title: Ben-ammi
html: BEN-AMMI(Ben-amʹmi) [Son of My People [that is, relatives]].Son of Lot by his younger daughter, hence half brother of Moab. Modern findings attest to the common use of the name during this period. Ben-ammi, also called Ammon, was forefather of the Ammonites.—Ge 19:31-38; see AMMON.
